text: The Genealogy of Saul
Now Benjamin fathered Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, Aharah the third,
Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
And Bela had sons: Addar, Gera, Abihud,
Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
Gera, Shephuphan, and Huram.
And these \add are\add* the sons of Ehud (these were heads of the ⸤families⸥\f + \fr 8:6 \ft Literally “fathers” \f* for the inhabitants of Geba, and they took them away to Manahath):
Naaman, Ahijah, and Gera, who took them away. And he fathered Uzza and Ahihud.
And Shaharaim fathered \add children\add* in the fields of Moab after he had sent them away—Hushim and Baara, his wives.
And he fathered by Hodesh his wife Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam,
Jeuz, Sakia, and Mirmah. These \add were\add* his sons, heads of the ⸤families⸥.\f + \fr 8:10 \ft Literally “fathers” \f*
And by Husham he fathered Abitub and Elpaal.
The sons of Elpaal: Eber, Misham, Shemed (he built Ono and Lod with ⸤its towns⸥),\f + \fr 8:12 \ft Literally “her daughters” \f*
and Beriah and Shema who \add were\add* the heads of the ⸤families⸥\f + \fr 8:13 \ft Literally “fathers” \f* of the inhabitants of Aijalon (they themselves chased away the inhabitants of Gath).
Now Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth,
Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
Michael, Ishpah, and Joha \add were\add* sons of Beriah.
And Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
Ishmerai, Izliah, and Jobab \add were\add* the sons of Elpaal.
And Jakim, Zikri, Zabdi,
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
Adaiah, Beraiah, and Shimrath \add were\add* the sons of Shimei.
And Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zikri, Hanan,
Hananiah, Elam, Antothijah,
Iphdeiah, and Peniel \add were\add* the sons of Shashak.
And Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
Jaareshiah, Elijah, and Zikri \add were\add* the sons of Jeroham.
These \add were\add* the heads of the ⸤families⸥\f + \fr 8:28 \ft Literally “fathers” \f* according to their generations, chiefs. These lived in Jerusalem.

And \add Jeiel\add*\f + \fr 8:29 \ft The name Jeiel comes from \xt 1 Chronicles 9:35; \ft it has dropped out of the text here \f* the father of Gibeon lived in Gibeon. And the name of his wife \add was\add* Maacah.
And his firstborn son \add was\add* Abdon, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zeker,
and Mikloth (he fathered Shimeah). Now these also lived nearby their brothers in Jerusalem with their kinsmen.
And Ner fathered Kish, and Kish fathered Saul, and Saul fathered Jonathan, Malchi-Shua, Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
And the son of Jonathan \add was\add* Merib-baal, and Merib-baal fathered Micah.
And the sons of Micah: Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.
And Ahaz fathered Jehoaddah, and Jehoaddah fathered Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri. And Zimri fathered Moza.
And Moza fathered Binea; Raphah \add was\add* his son, Eleasah his son, and Azel his son.
And Azel had six sons, and these \add are\add* their names: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan. All these \add were\add* the sons of Azel.
And the sons of Eshek his brother: Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
And the sons of Ulam were men \add who were\add* mighty warriors, bowmen, and \add they had\add* many sons and grandsons, one hundred and fifty. All these were Benjaminites.
